name: Radial Things
description:
Since there is no way we can reposition an object's anchor point in Figma, it is really hard to create circular/radial UIs. This was an attempt to make circular/radial UIs more manageable and a bit easier to customize.


This heavily uses the zero-frame hack, which I now call the "null frame" since it's the same concept for null objects in other design tools, especially in 3D.
